TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_namakay_uzip_nu_tademaw_minanam_tu_kamu_20180630, title = namakay_uzip_nu_tademaw_minanam_tu_kamu_20180630, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/namakay_uzip_nu_tademaw_minanam_tu_kamu_20180630} }

S.FORM: namakay uzip nu tademaw minanam tu kamu 20180630 siwkay 20180630-dabek nu minanam tu kamu nu Sakizaya, u sapinanam a sulit, mudadiw minanam tu Sakizaya a kamu. paylipay a demaid, minanam ku binacadan nu Sakizaya, tayza i Lou-Cendsin sasaydan a luma', ninama tu Sakizaya a kamu. u lawad nu cacay a sapicudad sa, enemay a tuki. sakacacay a sapicudad sa, u "namakay maplaw minanam tu kamu ", sakatusa a sapicudad sa, u "namakay sapibetik minanam tu kamu ", sakatulu a sapicudad sa, u " namakay uzip nu tademaw minanam tu kamu ", sakasepat a sapicudad sa, u "namakay kalabian minanam tu kamu ", sakalima a sapicudad sa, u "namakay dadiw minanam tu kamu ", sazikuzan a sapicudad sa, u "namakay lalangawan minanam tu kamu ". lacul 01.i luma' (namakay i luma' katukuh taputah #1) malanam ! (matabal,matabal tu sananal) 早安! masuni'tu ku satukiyan haw? 鬧鐘響了嗎? pinikaltu ! 該起床了! kabililen pinikal ! 快點兒起床! macukadtu kisu haw? 你醒了嗎? caay kalihalay (kasademsem) kisu haw? 你不舒服嗎? kapah haw ku bi isu? 睡得好嗎? kapah haw kisu tezepen kya satukiyan ? 能幫我關掉鬧鐘嗎? sazikuzay manikaltu kisu ! 你終於起來了. kapah ayza a demaid ! 今天好天氣! teban nu labi mabi' kisu haw ? 昨晚你熬夜了? pikeden ku pada(kupa). 把被子疊好. masiangi kaku tu da'cusay a simpi'. 我做了個可怕的夢. tahanini kisu caay pipaneng kya tinghuy. 你一直沒關燈啊. papialulu tu kisu. 我得洗臉了. kalanamtu 該吃早飯了. masasmel henay kaku. 我還很睏. masuwab kaku. 我打哈欠. mabusuk henay kaku nanucilaay a epah. 昨天的酒還沒醒呢. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan nasulitan nay pabalucu'ay a kawaw nu subana'ay a pu 2018-1 sakasitangah nu Sakizaya

namakay ozip no tademaw minanam to kamo 20180630 siwkay 20180630-dabek no minanam to kamo no Sakizaya, o sapinanam a solit, modadiw minanam to Sakizaya a kamo. paylipay a demaid, minanam ko binacadan no Sakizaya, tayza i Loo-Cendsin sasaydan a loma', ninama to Sakizaya a kamo. o lawad no cacay a sapicodad sa, enemay a toki. sakacacay a sapicodad sa, o "namakay maplaw minanam to kamo ", sakatosa a sapicodad sa, o "namakay sapibetik minanam to kamo ", sakatolo a sapicodad sa, o " namakay ozip no tademaw minanam to kamo ", sakasepat a sapicodad sa, o "namakay kalabian minanam to kamo ", sakalima a sapicodad sa, o "namakay dadiw minanam to kamo ", sazikozan a sapicodad sa, o "namakay lalangawan minanam to kamo ". lacol 01.i loma' (namakay i loma' katokoh tapotah #1) malanam ! (matabal,matabal to sananal) 早安! masoni'to ko satokiyan haw? 鬧鐘響了嗎? pinikalto ! 該起床了! kabililen pinikal ! 快點兒起床! macokadto kiso haw? 你醒了嗎? caay kalihalay (kasademsem) kiso haw? 你不舒服嗎? kapah haw ko bi iso? 睡得好嗎? kapah haw kiso tezepen kya satokiyan ? 能幫我關掉鬧鐘嗎? sazikozay manikalto kiso ! 你終於起來了. kapah ayza a demaid ! 今天好天氣! teban no labi mabi' kiso haw ? 昨晚你熬夜了? pikeden ko pada(kopa). 把被子疊好. masiangi kako to da'cosay a simpi'. 我做了個可怕的夢. tahanini kiso caay pipaneng kya tinghoy. 你一直沒關燈啊. papialolo to kiso. 我得洗臉了. kalanamto 該吃早飯了. masasmel henay kako. 我還很睏. masowab kako. 我打哈欠. mabosok henay kako nanocilaay a epah. 昨天的酒還沒醒呢. namakayniay a nasolitan nasakamoan ato natinengan nasolitan nay pabaloco'ay a kawaw no sobana'ay a po 2018-1 sakasitangah no Sakizaya
